document.full_text: warner chilcott, a pharmaceutical manufacturer, reported better-than-expected results, helped by lower costs, and raised its full-year earnings outlook, sending its shares up 6 percent friday.
document.title: business briefing | health: drug maker posts a loss but tops forecasts
lines_and_colors: warner chilcott, a pharmaceutical manufacturer, reported better-than-expected results, helped by lower costs, and raised its full-year earnings outlook, sending its shares up 6 percent friday.
